summary: Gimli's Battleaxe from Lord of the Rings
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Description:[/size][/b]

Adds Gimlis Battleaxe from Lord of the Rings as weapon.
Standalone item doesn't replace anything.
Same stats as Dwarven Battleaxe and can be crafted with the same materials.

Includes high res handdrawn texture, normal map and enviroment map.

[size=2][b][color=red]>>It looks better in game than on the screenshots!<<[/color][/b][/size]

----------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Instructions:[/size][/b]

Extract to Data folder in Skyrim directory.
In Skyrim Launcher make sure "gimliaxe.esp" is checked.

----------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3]Changelog:[/size]

v1.1
-Fixed texture:
less reflection
more dirt
corrected error
(screenshots are updated)
author: realadry
